# bq-option-group



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Shadow Parts

| Part       | Description                                                      |
| ---------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `"group"`  | The `div` element which holds the option items                   |
| `"label"`  | The `legend` tag element which acts as a container for the label |
| `"prefix"` | The prefix of the label                                          |
| `"suffix"` | The suffix of the label                                          |
